page.title: 04 Church Events.
page.content: {The Church Open Day.} On June 29th.Saint Peter's Church had an open day. From 2.30pm.onwards people came to do things like brass rubbing,have a guided tour up the tower or take part in a treasure hunt. For the treasure hunt they were given questions on a sheet and had to find the answers.There were also pictures and books for sale. {The Vicarage Garden Party. } Sunday 30th.June was the day of the vicarage garden party.There were games,competitions,pony rides,a fancy dress parade and an obstacle course.On the obstacle course you had to dribble a football round cones,throw 3 balls in a tyre,go under a net,walk along a log,jump about 50cms.high,hit a ball round sticks and then run back.There was food and ice cream for sale.
